Isabella Rodriguez.description: still working at the counter, taking orders and chatting with customers @ the Ville:Hobbs Cafe:cafe:behind the cafe counter

Maria Lopez.description: conversing about Maria Lopez and Klaus Mueller discussing working on Klaus's paper, with Maria offering to help find missing sources and suggesting grabbing a coffee and snack at Hobbs Cafe before heading to the library. @ <persona> Klaus Mueller
chat: Maria Lopez
Hey Klaus, how's the paper going? Need any help?
Klaus Mueller
Hey Maria, thanks for asking. It's going well, but I'm struggling with a few sources. Do you mind taking a look?
Maria Lopez
Sure, I'd be happy to help. Let's take a look together.
Klaus Mueller
Thank you so much, Maria. I really appreciate your help.
Maria Lopez
Let's head over to the library together and work on it there. I think we can find those sources you need.
Klaus Mueller
That sounds great, Maria. Thank you for being so willing to help.
Maria Lopez
Let's grab our stuff and head over to the library now.
Klaus Mueller
Should we grab a quick bite to eat before heading to the library?
Maria Lopez
Sure, we can grab a quick snack at Hobbs Cafe before heading to the library. It's right by here.
Klaus Mueller
Sounds like a plan. I could use a coffee to boost my energy as well.
Maria Lopez
Let's go grab a coffee and head to the library. I think that will help us focus better.
Klaus Mueller
Thanks for suggesting to grab coffee, Maria. I appreciate it.
Maria Lopez
Let's sit down at a table and start working on your paper. I'll do my best to help you find those sources.
Klaus Mueller
Thank you so much, Maria. I honestly don't know what I would do without your help.
Maria Lopez
Let's start by looking at the sources you have so far. I can help you figure out which ones are missing and where you might be able to find them.
Klaus Mueller
Thank you for offering to help, Maria. I appreciate it more than you know.
